definitions.definition: Physically secure and certain, non-failing, reliable.
definitions.example: This investment is a sure thing.   The bailiff had a sure grip on the prisoner's arm.

definitions.definition: Certain in one's knowledge or belief.
definitions.example: He was sure she was lying.   I am sure of my eventual death.   John was acting sure of himself but in truth had doubts.

definitions.definition: Certain to act or be a specified way.
definitions.example: Be sure to lock the door when you leave.
